title: Was Benjamin Franklin the first to incorporate colored fiber into currency?
description: Zenas Marshall Crane usually credited with introducing fibers to paper currency in 1844.

title: “Church of Bleach” family goes to trial, representing themselves in court
description: The family, defending itself in the trial, declined to provide an opening statement.

title: Report: OpenAI holding back GPT-4 image features on fears of privacy issues
description: GPT-4's image capabilities can recognize certain individuals, according to NYT.

title: Battery shortage forces GM to pause commercial EV production
description: GM's efforts to scale up EV production are being hampered by supply issues.

title: OnePlus 12 spec leak promises giant 5400 mAh battery
description: A big year-over-year battery increase, same-y design, and maybe more RAM.

title: Exploited 0-days, an incomplete fix, and a botched disclosure: Infosec snafu reigns
description: The exploited code-execution flaws are the kind coveted by ransomware and nation-state hackers.

title: Meta launches Llama 2, an open source AI model that allows commercial applications
description: A family of pretrained and fine-tuned language models in sizes from 7 to 70 billion parameters.

title: The armor of armored fish started out as part of the nervous system
description: Cells from the developing spinal cord make the sturgeon's bony, armored plates.

title: Musk, Tesla board to return $735M after being sued for overpaying themselves
description: Shareholder lawsuit said Tesla board pay "grossly exceeds" corporate norms.

title: Norway has had it with Meta, threatens $100K fines for data violations
description: "It is so clear that this is illegal," Norwegian regulator said.

title: Microsoft 365’s Copilot assistant for businesses comes with a hefty price tag
description: Copilot runs $30 per user per month on top of your existing Microsoft 365 plan.

title: Caught in the act: Mammal found with teeth sunk in a much larger dinosaur
description: New fossil from China captures the last moments of a life-or-death struggle.

title: NHTSA investigating Tesla Autopilot after yet another fatal crash
description: NHTSA has opened dozens of investigations into Tesla after more than 30 deaths.

title: Typo leaks millions of US military emails to Mali web operator
description: Spelling error misdirected sensitive Pentagon messages to company running Mali’s TLD.
